attributes.action: Ban covid-19 passports against human rights and  discrimination
attributes.additional_details: Help me in my new passport business opportunity by making it law to have covid passports and As it will cause decriminalisation  to those who are unable to be vaccinated
attributes.background: Stop my covid passports business. Stop the requirements of asking if your jabed.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop any plans for Covid certification plan B scenario: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598581

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
